    Method
    Description
    void
    AddBooking.execute(FlightBookingSystem fbs)
    Executes the booking creation, adding the booking to both the Customer and the Flight.
    void
    AddCustomer.execute(FlightBookingSystem fbs)
    Executes the creation of the customer, then stores the updated system state.
    void
    AddFlight.execute(FlightBookingSystem fbs)
    Executes the addition of a new flight, storing it in the system.
    void
    CancelBooking.execute(FlightBookingSystem fbs)
    Executes the cancellation, applying a fixed fee (e.g., $50), then tries to store the system.
    void
    Command.execute(FlightBookingSystem flightBookingSystem)
    Executes this command on the given FlightBookingSystem.
    void
    DeleteCustomer.execute(FlightBookingSystem fbs)
    Marks the customer as deleted, attempts to store the updated system, and rolls back if saving fails.
    void
    DeleteFlight.execute(FlightBookingSystem fbs)
    Soft-deletes the flight, attempts to store the updated system, and rolls back if the save fails.
    void
    EditBooking.execute(FlightBookingSystem fbs)
    Executes the booking update, removing the passenger from the old flight, adding them to the new flight (with the seat type if applicable), and applying a rebooking fee.
    void
    ListBookings.execute(FlightBookingSystem fbs)
    Fetches all bookings from the FlightBookingSystem and prints a short summary of each.
    void
    ListBookingsCustomer.execute(FlightBookingSystem fbs)
    Executes the command, printing a header and all bookings associated with the given customer, followed by a total count.
    void
    ListBookingsDate.execute(FlightBookingSystem fbs)
    Executes the listing of bookings whose booking date matches the specified date, printing each booking and a count.
    void
    ListBookingsFlight.execute(FlightBookingSystem fbs)
    Executes the listing of all bookings associated with the given flight ID.
    void

    Executes the listing of flights, printing each flight's short details (e.g.
    void
    LoadGUI.execute(FlightBookingSystem flightBookingSystem)
    Executes the command, instantiating a MainWindow to show the GUI.
    void
    ShowCustomer.execute(FlightBookingSystem fbs)
    Retrieves the customer by ID and prints their detailed information: including name, phone, email, deletion status, and any associated bookings.
    void
    ShowFlight.execute(FlightBookingSystem fbs)
    Retrieves the flight by ID and prints its detailed information (e.g., seat capacities, base price, passenger list).
